mapper.select: select wf.WORKFLOW_ID as workflowId , wf.WORKFLOW_NAME as workflowName , wf.DESCRIPTION as description , wf.STATUS as status , wf.PRIORITY as priority , wf.BU_ID as buId , wf.CREATED_DATE as createdDate , wf.CREATED_BY as createdBy , CONCAT(cr.FIRST_NAME,' ',cr.LAST_NAME) as createdByName , wf.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate , wf.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy , CONCAT(upd.FIRST_NAME,' ',upd.LAST_NAME) as updatedByName FROM tb_workflow wf left join tb_user cr on wf.CREATED_BY = cr.ID left join tb_user upd on wf.UPDATED_BY =upd.ID where wf.WORKFLOW_ID=#{workflowId} limit 1
